v0.6.0-dev
-----------------------
Preparing to public release.
Stabilizing code. Writing docs.
First public usable release will be 0.6.1

v0.5.0
-----------------------
Feature complete for in-house usage.
No tests. No documentation

v0.4.0
-----------------------
In-house release.
Ready for production, but lots of features missing.


v0.1.0
-----------------------
Initial release.
Not usable in production.
